podcastDetails.podcastDescription: Jay and Matt talk about toys, junk food, the holidays, movies and retro geek stuff. Sometimes a weird robot joins in.

episodes.episodeDescription: We're celebrating Halloween with a look at eight great SKELETONS from all walks of pop culture! Listen now, or we'll have a bone to pick with you.
Our annual Spooky Songs show is here! We're naming 10 more tracks that NEED to be on your Halloween playlist. Enjoy the tunes, and hopefully us too!

episodes.episodeTitle: The 1990 Horror Hall of Fame Awards!
episodes.episodeDescription: We dive deep into this famous TV special that featured everything from spiders winning statues to Chucky wearing a white tuxedo. The Horror Hall of Fame Awards rocked!
We're celebrating Count Chocula, Franken Berry and all of their pals with a whole show dedicated to the Monster Cereals! Listen... if you dare.
Since we can't beat the heat, we're joining it! This is our FIRE show, where everything we talk about has something to do with fire! This episode is HOT.
We're paying tribute to ten more discontinued foods, from PB Max to Paradise Punch Bubblicious! Get ready to be hungry.
We're naming eight of our favorite BLUE things, from Casey the Robot to that weird zombie from The Video Dead.
Join us as we revisit our all-time favorite mall stores, from Kay-Bee Toys to Waldenbooks and beyond!
We dive deep into the original UNSOLVED MYSTERIES series to name six of our favorite creepy segments.
Travel with us to the future! We're looking at things that were either set in the future, or that just seemed futuristic in their time!
Our annual tradition continues! We're naming another 10 of our favorite Christmas songs, with artists ranging from Kylie Minogue to Alpha 5!
Originally released as an exclusive for Salem Horror Fest 2020, our tribute to all things Gremlins is now available to ALL Purple Stuff listeners. Enjoy!
We're revisiting the 2001 Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade -- and checking in with everyone from Tim Curry to Cheesasaurus Rex along the way!
We're taste-testing Brach's Turkey Dinner Candy Corn -- a whole Thanksgiving meal in candy corn form! It's as gross as it sounds.
We're diving into the 1985 broadcasts of Garfield's Halloween Adventure and It's The Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown!
We're naming another ten tracks that you totally NEED to put on your Halloween playlists!
Spooky time! We're naming eight great vampires -- from Count Koopula to Dracula himself!
We're naming eight great sodas from the past and present -- everything from Pepsi Blue to Apple Slice!
We're diving into a 1988 episode of Friday the 13th: The Series -- and all of the old TV commercials that came with it!
We dive into the depths and report back on eight great sea monsters from all walks of pop culture!
From spooky fruit snacks to driving lessons from the Gremlins, we're naming eight of our favorite spooky TV commercials in the latest Purple Stuff Podcast!
We dive into WPIX's Shocktober '92 broadcast of Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter, and relive the thrill of watching horror movies on broadcast TV!

episodes.episodeTitle: Dick Tracy from the Summer of 1990!
episodes.episodeDescription: For us, the summer of 1990 was all about Dick Tracy. In this extra-long ep, we sort through our memories of monster mobsters and Breathless Mahoney.
We're tackling eight great robots from all walks of pop culture. Everything from Metroplex to the Killbots from Chopping Mall!
Our holiday tradition continues! We're naming 10 more tracks that would be perfect on your holiday playlists!
We dive deep into the 1990 Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade on this very special episode of the Purple Stuff Podcast!
We're kicking off the holiday season with a look at 10 awesome Christmas commercials. Nostalgia overload!
We pay tribute to the Universal Monsters as only we can -- with references to Power Rangers and The Real Ghostbusters.
We're naming another ten tracks that you need to add to your Halloween playlist. It's the sixth volume of Spooky Songs!
We're kicking off the Purple Stuff's 2019 Halloween season with a tribute to EVIL CLOWNS from all walks of pop culture!
We're ending Summer Saturdays with a celebration of all things PIZZA! From Pizza the Hutt to Freddy Krueger's soul pizza, it's our cheesiest episode ever.
Jay and Matt hit a New Jersey flea market and report back with their "amazing" finds.
Summer Saturdays continues! This week, Jay and Matt answer summer-themed questions from Purple Stuff listeners.
The Purple Stuff Podcast begins its SUMMER SATURDAYS event with 10 awesome summertime tunes!
New minisode! It's more Stranger Things madness as Jay and Matt hunt down an "Upside Down Whopper" from a NYC Burger King!
Jay and Matt enter THE UPSIDE DOWN to sample cans of NEW COKE. We're telling the whole weird story in this special Purple Stuff minisode!
From Hocus Pocus to Troll 2, we're naming 10 of our favorite witches! Pour some tea and hit the lights.
We're naming 10 pro-wrestlers who gave acting a shot. Get set for Bane, Zeus, Captain Freedom and more!

episodes.episodeTitle: The Best TV Theme Songs, Part II!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt name another ten of their favorite TV theme songs -- everything from Jem to Cheers!
We're naming ten awesome RED things, from Lydia's wedding dress to cherry Starburst. It's our RED show!
This week, we're tackling ten space aliens from all walks of pop culture. It's our tribute to beings from another world!
We're celebrating the new year with a look at some new OLD stuff -- like New Coke and New Kids on the Block!
Jay and Matt celebrate Christmas by naming 8 of their favorite holiday traditions!
The Purple Stuff Podcast returns with 10 more holiday tunes that need to be on your Christmas playlist!
Jay and Matt pay tribute to National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation -- perhaps the greatest Christmas movie ever!
Here are the details on our new Patreon page, where you can score monthly bonus shows. This is just a promo; don't get too excited!
Jay and Matt review the 1994 Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade, featuring everything from Skeleton Warriors to Kenny G!

episodes.episodeTitle: Episode #54: The Best of the 2018 Halloween Season!
episodes.episodeDescription: From scary movies to strange cheeseburgers, we're naming the best parts of the 2018 Halloween season!
SPOILER WARNING! We've seen the new Halloween movie, so naturally, we had to talk about that.
Jay and Matt tackle the Halloween franchise with memories of the movies, toys, games and more!
Jay and Matt kick off the 2018 Halloween season with 12 more SPOOKY SONGS for your playlist!

episodes.episodeTitle: Episode #50: Ice Cream and Frozen Treats!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt return with their huge tribute to ICE CREAM! We're covering 16 of our favorite frozen treats in this special summer episode!

episodes.episodeTitle: Minisode #8: Star Wars "Solo" Menu at Denny's!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt visit Denny's to try out their weird new Solo-themed menu!
It's our annual WrestleMania show! We're tackling 10 "minor" moments WrestleMania history!
Jay and Matt name 10 awesome GREEN things. You weren't expecting that, were you?
Jay and Matt name 10 of their all-time favorite Super Bowl commercials, featuring everything from Bugle Boy jeans to Crystal Pepsi!

episodes.episodeTitle: Minisode #7: Star Wars Cocktails at AMC Theatres!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt prepare for The Last Jedi by trying two strange Star Wars-themed cocktails, now available at AMC Theatres!
Jay and Matt return with another 12 Christmas songs to give your holiday playlists a shot of adrenaline!
Jay and Matt pay tribute to HOME ALONE, one of the best holiday movies ever!
Jay and Matt return just in time for Halloween to answer a bunch of creepy questions sent in by Purple Stuff listeners!
Jay and Matt play a round of Monster Mini Golf, and live to tell the tale!
Jay and Matt return with another batch of spooky songs for your Halloween playlist!

episodes.episodeTitle: Minisode #5: Krispy Kreme's Pumpkin Spice Doughnuts!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt got up at 5AM for a crack at Krispy Kreme's pumpkin spice doughnuts, which were available for one day only!
Jay and Matt visit a "escape room" attraction in Philly, where things feel... eerily familiar.
Jay and Matt hit Dollar General and Kmart on the hunt for Halloween goodies!
Jay and Matt go to see a horror movie, and live to tell the tale!

episodes.episodeTitle: Minisode: The Hunt for Halloween Candles!
episodes.episodeDescription: Jay and Matt barely survive a wicked thunderstorm all so they can buy some overpriced candles.
Jay and Matt chat about 12 awesome cars from all walks of pop culture!
The Purple Stuff Podcast returns with a one-hour SHARKSTRAVAGANZA, covering everything from Jaws to Street Sharks!
Jay and Matt celebrate WrestleMania with this look at 12 awesome WWE entrance themes!
Jay and Matt return with their tribute to A Nightmare on Elm Street!
The Purple Stuff Podcast returns with a 75 minute tribute to FRIDAY THE 13TH!
SNOW DAY! This week, Jay and Matt talk about 12 of their favorite wintery things!
Matt and Jay suggest another 12 Christmas songs for your holiday playlist!
Jay and Matt are BACK, and they're ready to GIVE THANKS for 10 strange things.
Get into the Halloween spirit with another list of things that are way scarier than they should be!
Jay and Matt suggest another 10 SPOOKY SONGS for your Halloween playlist!
We're kicking off the 2016 Halloween season with a look at 12 seriously scary movie scenes!
Jay and Matt celebrate 1988's best movies, foods, toys and more!
From sharks to Super Soakers, Jay and Matt rattle off 10 of their favorite summer memories!
Jay and Matt celebrate the very best things about 1990 -- from Gremlins 2 to Vanilla Ice!
ECTO COOLER IS BACK! Jay and Matt celebrate with a special bonus episode!
Jay and Matt celebrate 12 of their favorite TV theme songs -- from Charles in Charge to Game of Thrones!
Not your average scares! Jay and Matt discuss 12 things that are way spookier than they should be.
Jay and Matt reminisce about 1992, covering the year's biggest movies, geek fads and more!
In honor of WrestleMania weekend, Jay and Matt share their WWE memories!
Jay and Matt rediscover 1989's Batman... love that Joker!
Who ya gonna call? Jay and Matt revisit their greatest Ghostbusters memories in this special one hour episode!
Get ready for HE-MANIA! Matt and Jay talk about all things Masters of the Universe!
Jay and Matt celebrate 11 of the best things that came out in 1986, from My Pet Monster to Lazer Tag!
This week, Jay and Matt cover THE NEWS. (Don't worry, we mean stuff like soda, toys and movies.)
Jay and Matt talk about their favorite pop culture mascots, from Geoffrey the Giraffe to the Cadbury Bunny!
It's our special Christmas episode! Jay and Matt talk about twelve of their favorite holiday tunes!
It's our special STAR WARS episode! Join us for an hour of Star Wars memories as we await the debut of The Force Awakens!
Jay and Matt wax nostalgic about childhood board games, from Fireball Island to Electronic Talking Battleship!
The Purple Stuff Podcast CONTINUES with a tribute to discontinued snacks that we want back! From Pizzarias to Crystal Pepsi, there are few finer junk foods than these!
To celebrate the end of the spooky season, Jay and Matt determine the ABCs of Halloween!
Jay and Matt discuss their Halloween & horror GUILTY PLEASURES.
Matt and Jay cover ANOTHER 13 spooky songs that would be perfect for anyone's Halloween playlist!
Jay and Matt talk about GHOSTS from all walks of pop culture... some famous, some not!
Jay and Matt play a Halloween-themed game of FACT OR FICTION. Why not play along?
Jay and Matt take turns pitching songs for the PERFECT Halloween playlist. How spooky!
Jay and Matt talk about PUMPKIN MONSTERS from all walks of pop culture in another special Halloween episode!
It's a Halloween Q&A session! Several listeners sent in spooky questions... now it's Matt and Jay's turn to answer them!
Jay and Matt design their idealized Halloween television marathon, filled with movies, toons and mayhem!
Matt and Jay talk about what old Halloween things they'd bring back if they had the powers of Dr. Frankenstein!
Jay and Matt play a little game of HALLOWEEN WORD ASSOCIATION on this edition of The Purple Stuff Podcast.
Jay and Matt talk about their biggest CHILDHOOD FEARS in the second episode of The Purple Stuff Podcast!
